name: Grand Hindu
description: Grand Hindu is the potent cross of Granddaddy Purple and Hindu Kush. Both sides of this mix are apparent in the sweet grape aroma of this strain that is served up with a healthy dose of earthy kush spice. Flowers will also have the purple coloration that is indicative of its GDP genetics. Lazy and relaxing, this strain is a good choice for pain when zoning out is an option.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Happy, Aroused, Creative, Inflammation, Pain, Eye Pressure, Stress, Headaches, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid
